notes.note:
Momentum scrolling after a two-finger pan is broken when two fingers are lifted at the same time ([Bug 1457743][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1457743

system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.1
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
title: Firefox for Android 60.0.1 Release
